overlay.message: Tap or click the paddle to guide the particle and shatter the quantum bricks.

table.placeholder: Select an element to display its properties.

fusion.title: Molecular fusion chamber
fusion.intro: Combine your elements to attempt creating brand new molecules. Ingredients are taken from your current stock and success is never guaranteed.

elements.title: Element bonuses
elements.subtitle: Cosmic common · Planetary essential · Stellar forge · Mineral singularity · Quantum myth · Unreal

photon.title: Photon
photon.closeAria: Close Photon and return to options

goals.title: Objectives & trophies
goals.intro: Track your galactic achievements and unlock permanent bonuses.
goals.empty: No trophy completed yet. Finish objectives to display them here.

music.title: Music
music.note: Music starts automatically after your first interaction.

brickSkin.title: Brick skins
brickSkin.note: Unlock the “Rush to a Million” trophy to customize your bricks.

photon.title: Photon
photon.note: Match the halo color with the falling light beams.

devkit.title: Quantum DevKit
devkit.intro: Cheat tools for rapid experimentation. Changes apply instantly.

modes.title: Persistent modes
modes.note: Modes remain active while the session stays open (shortcut F9).

devkit.footer: Press F9 to open or close the DevKit.

freeElectrons.name: Free Electrons
freeElectrons.description: Channel electrons to boost every quantum click.
freeElectrons.effect: Manual production: +1 APC per level. Every 25 levels: +10% APC.
freeElectrons.effectSummary: Manual production +1 APC per level. Every 25 levels grants +10% APC.

physicsLab.name: Physics Laboratory
physicsLab.description: Research teams supercharge your atomic production.
physicsLab.effect: Passive production: +1 APS per level. Every 10 labs grant +10% global APC. Accelerator ≥200: Labs +20% APS.
physicsLab.effectSummary: Passive production +1 APS per level. Every 10 labs add +10% global APC. Particle Accelerator ≥200: labs +20% APS.

nuclearReactor.name: Nuclear Reactor
nuclearReactor.effect: Passive production: +10 APS per level (+1% per 50 Electrons, +20% if Labs ≥200). Every 100 reactors: global APC ×2 (cumulative).
nuclearReactor.effectSummary: Passive production +10 APS per level. +1% APS per 50 Free Electrons, +20% APS if Labs ≥200. Every 100 reactors: global APC ×2.

particleAccelerator.name: Particle Accelerator
particleAccelerator.description: Boost your particles to multiply APC.
particleAccelerator.effect: Passive production: +50 APS per level (bonus if ≥100 Supercomputers). Each level grants +5% APC. Tier 200: +20% Lab production.
particleAccelerator.effectSummary: Passive production +50 APS per level (+50% if ≥100 Supercomputers). Each level adds +5% APC. Tier 200: Physics Labs +20% APS.

supercomputer.name: Supercomputers
supercomputer.description: Quantum compute centers optimize your gains.
supercomputer.effect: Passive production: +500 APS per level (doubled by Stations ≥300). Every 50 Supercomputers: global APS ×2 (cumulative).
supercomputer.effectSummary: Passive production +500 APS per level (×2 if Space Stations ≥300). Every 50 Supercomputers: global APS ×2.

interstellarProbe.name: Interstellar Probe
interstellarProbe.description: Explore the galaxy to gather even more.
interstellarProbe.effect: Passive production: +5,000 APS per level (boosted by Reactors). At 150 copies: each probe adds +10 APC.
interstellarProbe.effectSummary: Passive production +5,000 APS per level (scaled by Nuclear Reactors). At 150 copies, each probe adds +10 APC.

spaceStation.name: Space Station
spaceStation.effect: Passive production: +50,000 APS per level. Each Station grants +5% APC. Tier 300: Supercomputers +100%.
spaceStation.effectSummary: Passive production +50,000 APS per level. Each station adds +5% APC. Tier 300: Supercomputers produce +100%.

starForge.name: Star Forger
starForge.description: Forge stars and turbocharge your APC.
starForge.effect: Passive production: +500,000 APS per level (+2% APS per Station). Every 50 Forgers: global APC ×2 (cumulative).
starForge.effectSummary: Passive production +500,000 APS per level (+2% APS per Space Station). Every 50 Forgers: global APC ×2.

artificialGalaxy.name: Artificial Galaxy
artificialGalaxy.effect: Passive production: +5,000,000 APS per level (doubled by Library ≥300). Each level increases APS by 10%. Tier 100: +50% global APC.
artificialGalaxy.effectSummary: Passive production +5,000,000 APS per level (×2 if Omniverse Library ≥300). Each level adds +10% APS. Tier 100: +50% global APC.

multiverseSimulator.name: Multiverse Simulator
multiverseSimulator.description: Simulate infinity to optimize every second.
multiverseSimulator.effect: Passive production: +500,000,000 APS per level. Synergy: +0.5% global APS per owned building. Tier 200: building costs −5%.
multiverseSimulator.effectSummary: Passive production +500,000,000 APS per level. Synergy: +0.5% global APS per owned building. Tier 200: all building costs −5%.

realityWeaver.name: Reality Weaver
realityWeaver.description: Weave physical laws to your advantage.
realityWeaver.effect: Passive production: +10,000,000,000 APS per level. Rounded click bonus: +0.1 × buildings × level. Tier 300: total production ×2.
realityWeaver.effectSummary: Passive production +10,000,000,000 APS per level. Rounded click bonus: +0.1 × buildings × level. Tier 300: total production ×2.

cosmicArchitect.name: Cosmic Architect
cosmicArchitect.description: Rewrite the cosmos to cut future costs.
cosmicArchitect.effect: Passive production: +1,000,000,000,000 APS per level. Reduces future costs by 1% per Architect. Every 50 Architects: global APC ×2 (cumulative).
cosmicArchitect.effectSummary: Passive production +1,000,000,000,000 APS per level. Future building costs −1% per Architect. Every 50 Architects: global APC ×2.

omniverseLibrary.name: Omniverse Library
omniverseLibrary.description: Compile infinite knowledge to boost all output.
omniverseLibrary.effect: Passive production: +10,000,000,000,000,000 APS per level. +2% global boost per Parallel Universe. Tier 300: Artificial Galaxies ×2.
omniverseLibrary.effectSummary: Passive production +10,000,000,000,000,000 APS per level. +2% global boost per Parallel Universe. Tier 300: Artificial Galaxies ×2.

quantumOverseer.name: Grand Quantum Overseer
quantumOverseer.description: Order the multiverse and reach singularity.
quantumOverseer.effect: Passive production: +1,000,000,000,000,000,000 APS per level. Tier 100: permanently doubles all gains.
quantumOverseer.effectSummary: Passive production +1,000,000,000,000,000,000 APS per level. Tier 100: permanently doubles all gains.

scaleHumanCell.name: Scale: human cell
scaleHumanCell.flavor: the equivalent of an “average” human cell

scaleSandGrain.name: Scale: grain of sand
scaleSandGrain.flavor: the mass of a grain of sand (~1 mm)

scaleWaterDrop.name: Scale: drop of water
scaleWaterDrop.flavor: the number of atoms in a 0.05 mL drop of water

scalePaperclip.name: Scale: paperclip
scalePaperclip.flavor: equivalent to an iron paperclip (~1 g)

scaleCoin.name: Scale: coin
scaleCoin.flavor: atomic mass of a coin (~7.5 g)

scaleApple.name: Scale: apple
scaleApple.flavor: atomic mass of an apple (~100 g)

scaleSmartphone.name: Scale: smartphone
scaleSmartphone.flavor: as many as a modern smartphone (~180 g)

scaleWaterLitre.name: Scale: liter of water
scaleWaterLitre.flavor: equivalent to one liter of water

scaleCar.name: Scale: compact car
scaleCar.flavor: as much as a compact car (~1.3 t)

scalePyramid.name: Scale: Great Pyramid
scalePyramid.flavor: atomic mass of the Great Pyramid of Khufu

scaleAtmosphere.name: Scale: Earth's atmosphere
scaleAtmosphere.flavor: equal to the entire Earth's atmosphere

scaleOceans.name: Scale: Earth's oceans
scaleOceans.flavor: as much as all Earth's oceans

scaleEarth.name: Scale: Earth
scaleEarth.flavor: equal to the atomic mass of planet Earth

scaleMilkyWay.name: Scale: Milky Way
scaleMilkyWay.flavor: comparable to the entire Milky Way

scaleLocalGroup.name: Scale: Local Group
scaleLocalGroup.flavor: as much as the Local Group of galaxies

scaleObservableUniverse.name: Scale: observable universe
scaleObservableUniverse.flavor: reach the estimated number of atoms in the observable universe

reward.description: Adds +{bonus} to the global boost for manual and automatic production (×{total} for this tier).

welcomeCard.title: Welcome
welcomeCard.intro: Welcome to Atom to Univers. Start by clicking to earn Atoms (APC Atoms Per Click), purchase upgrades in the shop, and automate harvesting (APS Atoms Per Second). Unlock mini-games as you progress. The goal is to gather as many Atoms as possible to forge a Universe.

particles.label: Particles mini-game:
particles.description: Collide elementary particles to earn draw tickets for the Gacha and credits for the Mach3 mini-game.

gacha.label: Gacha:
gacha.description: Spend your tickets to obtain atoms from the periodic table; completing collections grants APS and APC bonuses among others.

match3.label: Mach3 mini-game:
match3.description: A Match 3 game—line up Copper, Bronze, Silver, Gold, and Carbon (Diamond) as quickly as possible before the timer hits 0. Higher scores mean higher APS production bonuses.

photon.label: Photon mini-game:
photon.description: Play as a Photon switching states to slip between meshes or through holes for as long as possible. Bonus to be added later.

brickSkin.unlocked: Choose the appearance of Particles bricks.

devkit.elementsAdded: DevKit: {count} elements added to the collection!

shop.milestoneHint: Keep exploring ever larger orders of magnitude!

music.addFilesHint: Add your audio files to Assets/Music to enable music.
music.selectTrack: Select a track to start the music.
music.unsupportedSuffix: . Audio playback unavailable on this device.
music.errorSuffix: . Unable to play the audio file.
music.awaitingInteractionSuffix: . Music will start after your first interaction.
music.fileMissing: The file for this track is missing.

metaux.gameInProgress: A game is already in progress. Finish it before starting a new one.

fusion.prompt: Select a recipe to attempt your first fusion.

table.placeholder: The periodic table will be available soon.

commun.label: Cosmic Common
commun.description: Fundamental bricks found across most nebulae.

essentiel.label: Planetary Essential
essentiel.description: Elements abundant on rocky worlds and habitable atmospheres.

stellaire.label: Stellar Forge
stellaire.description: Alloys shaped in stellar cores and scattered by supernovae.

singulier.label: Mineral Singularity
singulier.description: Sought-after crystals rarely concentrated in the same place.

mythique.label: Quantum Myth
mythique.description: Legendary elements with extreme, elusive properties.

irreel.label: Unreal
irreel.description: Artificial syntheses born only inside accelerators.

fusion.logMissingResources: You don't have enough resources for this fusion.
fusion.toastMissingResources: Not enough resources for this fusion.

errors.noElements: No elements available in the synthesis chambers.
errors.instableFlux: Unstable flux, unable to materialize an element.

trophies.reward: Adds +{bonus} to the global manual and automatic production boost (×{total} for this tier).

scaleHumanCell.name: Scale: Human cell
scaleHumanCell.flavor: roughly equal to an average human cell

scaleSandGrain.name: Scale: Grain of sand
scaleSandGrain.flavor: mass of a grain of sand (~1 mm)

scaleWaterDrop.name: Scale: Water drop
scaleWaterDrop.flavor: atoms in a 0.05 mL drop of water

scalePaperclip.name: Scale: Paperclip
scalePaperclip.flavor: equivalent to an iron paperclip (~1 g)

scaleCoin.name: Scale: Coin
scaleCoin.flavor: atomic mass of a coin (~7.5 g)

scaleApple.name: Scale: Apple
scaleApple.flavor: atomic mass of an apple (~100 g)

scaleSmartphone.name: Scale: Smartphone
scaleSmartphone.flavor: similar to a modern smartphone (~180 g)

scaleWaterLitre.name: Scale: Liter of water
scaleWaterLitre.flavor: equivalent to a liter of water (~300 g)

scaleCar.name: Scale: Compact car
scaleCar.flavor: same as a compact car (~1.3 t)

scalePyramid.name: Scale: Great Pyramid of Giza
scalePyramid.flavor: atoms of the Great Pyramid of Giza

scaleAtmosphere.name: Scale: Earth's atmosphere
scaleAtmosphere.flavor: equal to the full atmosphere of Earth

scaleEarth.name: Scale: Earth

scaleMilkyWay.name: Scale: Milky Way

scaleObservableUniverse.flavor: reach the estimated atoms of the observable universe

milestones.autoSynthesis: Collect {amount} atoms to unlock automatic synthesis.
milestones.quantumGloves: Reach {amount} atoms to improve your quantum gloves.
milestones.nextEra: Accumulate {amount} atoms to prepare the next era.

millionAtoms.name: Million Rush
millionAtoms.description: Accumulate a total of one million synthesized atoms.
millionAtoms.reward: Adds +{bonus} to the global manual and automatic production boost (×{total} once unlocked).

frenzyCollector.name: Frenetic Convergence
frenzyCollector.description: Trigger a total of 100 frenzies (APC and APS combined).
frenzyCollector.reward: Unlocks multi-frenzy: up to two frenzies can overlap.

frenzyMaster.name: Tri-Phase Tempest
frenzyMaster.description: Trigger a cumulative total of 1,000 frenzies.
frenzyMaster.reward: Activates triple frenzy and grants a global ×{multiplier} bonus.

ticketHarvester.name: Star Collector
ticketHarvester.description: Complete both the Cosmic Common and Planetary Essential collections.
ticketHarvester.reward: On the main screen, ticket stars auto-collect after 3 seconds.

alloyMastery.name: Alloy Mastery
alloyMastery.description: Successfully perform every available metal alloy fusion.

start.message: Tap or click the paddle to guide the particle and shatter the quantum bricks.

pause.message: Game paused. Tap the paddle to continue.

lifeLost.message: Particle lost! Tap the paddle to continue.

gameOver.withoutTickets: Game over! No tickets this time.

shop.locked: Purchase this upgrade to activate its effects.
